document_api_meta.title: Update Target Collaboration
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API is used by Seller to update STANDARD target collaboration.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: name
request_body_param.desc: The name of the target collaboration.

request_body_param.name: end_time
request_body_param.desc: The end time of the target collaboration.

request_body_param.name: products
request_body_param.desc:
The information about the products provided by the seller for target collaboration with creators in the target collaboration.
The maximum number of products is 100.
When a product is deleted from the product list, if the deleted product has been added to the showcase by the creator, it will take effect at 0:00 the next day, otherwise it will take effect immediately.

request_body_param.name: ^commission_rate
request_body_param.desc:
The desired commission rate for the target collaboration. The value is measured in ten thousandths. For example, 3587 means the commission fee equals 35.87% of the original price. The range is [100, 8000].
Increasing product commissions will take effect immediately, while reducing product commissions will take effect at 00:00 the next day if the current product has been added to the showcase by a creator, otherwise it will take effect immediately.

request_body_param.name: ^target_ad_commission_rate
request_body_param.desc:
The commission rate applies only to orders generated from ads. If a creator’s video is used as an ad without this rate being set, the resulting orders will instead earn either:
- The Shop Ads commission you configured in open collaboration, or
- The standard commission defined in this invitation.
The commission rate is specified in increments of 1/10,000.
For example, 1000 stands for 0.1 or 10%.

request_body_param.name: creator_user_open_ids
request_body_param.desc: The list of Creators' TikTok User Open IDs invited in the target collaboration. The maximum number of creators is 50. [More details](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/3obfokj6)

request_body_param.name: seller_contact_info
request_body_param.desc: Contact information for the seller in the target collaboration.

request_body_param.name: free_sample_rule
request_body_param.desc: The free sample rules set by the seller in the target collaboration.

request_body_param.name: ^has_free_sample
request_body_param.desc: If true, free samples are provided to creators invited to the target collaboration.

request_body_param.name: ^is_sample_approval_exempt
request_body_param.desc:
If true, creators invited to the target collaboration are exempt from seller review and will automatically be approved for a free sample.
Note that if has_free_sample=false, this field will not take effect.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^target_collaboration_conflicts
response_param.desc: A list of creators and products with target collaboration conflicts that caused target collaboration update failure.

response_param.name: ^^creator_user_open_id
response_param.desc: Creator Open ID. More details:https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/3obfokj6

response_param.name: ^^product_id
response_param.desc: The product identifier.

response_param.name: ^update_failed
response_param.desc: Describe which fields were not updated successfully.

response_param.name: ^^remove_creator_open_ids
response_param.desc: The list of creators' TikTok User Open IDs that have not been successfully removed. More details:https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/3obfokj6

response_param.name: ^^remove_product_ids
response_param.desc: The list of product ids that have not been successfully removed.

response_param.name: ^^add_creator_open_ids
response_param.desc: The list of creators' TikTok User Open IDs that have not been successfully added. More details:https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/3obfokj6

response_param.name: ^^add_products
response_param.desc: The list of products that have not been successfully added.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The product identifier.

response_param.name: ^^^commission_rate
response_param.desc: The desired commission rate for the target collaboration. The desired commission rate is expressed in hundredths of a percent. For example, 3587 is a commission rate of 35.87%. This value must be a minimum of 1000.

response_param.name: ^^change_commissions
response_param.desc: The list of commission information that has not been successfully changed.

response_param.name: ^^^product_id
response_param.desc: The product identifier.

response_param.name: ^^^commission_rate
response_param.desc: The desired commission rate for the target collaboration. The desired commission rate is expressed in hundredths of a percent. For example, 3587 is a commission rate of 35.87%. This value must be a minimum of 1000.

response_param.name: ^^end_time
response_param.desc: The end time of the target collaboration, which has not been successfully updated.

response_param.name: ^^seller_contact_info
response_param.desc: Contact information for the seller in the target collaboration which has not been successfully updated.

response_param.name: ^^^email
response_param.desc: Seller's email contact information which has not been successfully updated.

response_param.name: ^^name
response_param.desc: The name of the target collaboration.

error_code_list.msg: test account and non test account can not cross invite
The seller cannot invite their official creator.
There are products that do not belong to this merchant.
The invitation failed because the creator is already linked with a shop account.
seller can not invite his block creator
in sufficient quota to create invitation
remove excluded creators to create invitation
invitation contains creator exceed follower limit
Your invitation target contains an unavailable creator or product. Please check  your request params.Remove the unavailable creator or product id and try again.
The request parameters contain sensitive words.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationPut() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.AffiliateSellerV202508API.AffiliateSeller202508TargetCollaborationsTargetCollaborationIdPut(context.Background(), "7890786712312312")
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBody := affiliateSeller_v202508.NewAffiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBody()
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBody.SetName("openapi_test")
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBody.SetEndTime("1715654330")
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyProducts := affiliateSeller_v202508.NewAffiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyProducts()
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyProducts.SetId("789078671231312312")
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyProducts.SetCommissionRate(1000)
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyProducts.SetTargetAdCommissionRate(1000)
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyProductsList := []affiliateSeller_v202508.AffiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyProducts{*affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyProducts}
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBody.SetProducts(affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyProductsList)
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyCreatorUserOpenIdsList := []string{"123123213213"}
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBody.SetCreatorUserOpenIds(affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyCreatorUserOpenIdsList)
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodySellerContactInfo := affiliateSeller_v202508.NewAffiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodySellerContactInfo()
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodySellerContactInfo.SetEmail("test@bytedance.com")
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBody.SetSellerContactInfo(*affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodySellerContactInfo)
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyFreeSampleRule := affiliateSeller_v202508.NewAffiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyFreeSampleRule()
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyFreeSampleRule.SetHasFreeSample(true)
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyFreeSampleRule.SetIsSampleApprovalExempt(true)
    affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBody.SetFreeSampleRule(*affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBodyFreeSampleRule)
    request = request.AffiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBody(*affiliateSeller202508UpdateTargetCollaborationRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

sample_code.label: Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to manage a Seller's TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including creating collaborations, editing collaborations, searching collaborations, approving/rejecting creators, finding/adding/removing creators, generating affiliate links, managing affiliate orders and monitoring collaboration activity and performance.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to manage a your TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including creating collaborations, editing collaborations, approving/rejecting creators, finding/adding/removing creators, generating affiliate links, managing affiliate orders and monitoring collaboration activity and performance.

request_path_param.name: target_collaboration_id
request_path_param.desc: The unique id of specific target collaboration.
